text: Vermillion is a city in the southeastern part of the U.S. state of South Dakota. It is the county seat of Clay County, and it became a city in 1877. Vermillion is the 12th largest city in South Dakota; 11,695 people lived there at the 2020 census. The city is home to the University of South Dakota, a major college in the state. == References == == Other websites == *City of Vermillion website Category:County seats in South Dakota Category:Cities in South Dakota Category:1877 establishments in the United States Category:1870s establishments in Dakota Territory
title: Vermillion, South Dakota
